data.text: Kenaka Yehova anandiwuza kuti, “Ngakhale Mose ndi Samueli akanayima pamaso panga kupempherera anthu awa, Ine sindikanawachitira chisoni. Achotseni ndipo ndisawaonenso! Aleke apite!
Ndipo ngati akufunsa iwe kuti, ‘Kodi tipite kuti?’ uwawuze kuti, ‘Yehova akuti,
“Ine ndidzawatumizira mitundu inayi ya zinthu zowononga,” akutero Yehova, “lupanga lowapha, agalu owaluma, mbalame zamumlengalenga ndiponso zirombo zoti ziwadye ndi kuwawononga.
Ndidzawasandutsa kukhala chinthu chonyansa kwa anthu a maufumu onse a dziko lapansi chifukwa cha zimene Manase mwana wa Hezekiya mfumu ya Yuda anachita mu Yerusalemu.
Ine ndidzakubalalitsani kukuchotsani mʼmizinda ya mʼdzikomo
Mayi wa ana asanu ndi awiri wakomoka
Kalanga ine, amayi pakuti munandibereka ine,
Munandiyankhula ndipo mawu anu ndinawalandira bwino.
Sindinakhale nawo mʼgulu la anthu amadyera,
Nanga nʼchifukwa chiyani mavuto anga sakutha?
